column4: can anyone tell me why in the latest ubuntu i don't have the same level of flexibility in gnome desktop as in previous release and/or debian why can i put 2 panels on one side of the screen (one left other right)  or why do i have only 2 (instead of 4) workspaces
you can configure that yourself. that's not ubuntu's doing ;)
i'm used to configuring it from the desktop as w/ every other distro do i have to edit txt files now manually
no, just right click on panels and play around with stuff
